channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Calc Equicovariance
item.description: The goal is to find the determinant by re-writing \(\Sigma\) as a upper triangular matrix. Then [[Determinant of triangular matrix is the product of the diagonal]] We add a new row and new column. We aim to eliminate the original off diagonals. We need to remove the lower diagonal for obvious reasons. The upper diagonal is so that we can eliminate the terms in the first column that show up.

item.title: Calculating the determinent of an equicovariance matrix
item.description: The goal is to find the determinant by re-writing \(\Sigma\) as a upper triangular matrix. Then [[Determinant of triangular matrix is the product of the diagonal]] We add a new row and new column. Recall that the determinant can be defined recursively. Since the new matrix as a \(1\) in the \(\Sigma_{11}\) position, then the determinant remains the same. We aim to eliminate the original off diagonals. We need to remove the lower diagonal for obvious reasons.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
